original_text: The jailer woke up, and when he saw the prison doors open, he drew his sword and was about to kill himself because he thought the prisoners had escaped.
korean_text: 간수가 자다가 깨어 옥문들이 열린 것을 보고 죄수들이 도망한 줄 생각하고 칼을 빼어 자결하려 하거늘

sentences.original_text: and when he saw the prison doors open
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 감옥 문이 열린 것을 보았을 때

sentences.original_text: and was about to kill himself
because he thought the prisoners had escaped
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그는 죄수들이 도망갔다고 생각했기 때문입니다
